Hooked On Chain Stitching

Yesterday we posted an example of the Blackhawks chain stitched logo. Today, we wanted to show you a few more.  In the early days of jerseys, chain stitching was used all over the place, including for player names.  That’s intense.  See below for an example of that – most of you probably remember the legendary Ross Perkins of the WHA … Read More
